name: Learning Process #2
description:
PRESS MOUSE TO CREATE NEW ITERATION OF SHAPES

Learning Process 2 was a practice in class objects and generating arrays of objects using for-loops. Sketch also practices basic object movement and re-generative composition using function mousePressed. 

"Learning Process" is a series in which I document my learning progress with P5JS and creative coding.

Created by nemocake on 9/22/2021 using P5JS.
